EmailTemplate.subject: Fast, Global In-Flight Connectivity for Your Global Express Jet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Global In-Flight Connectivity for your Global Express Jet
Honeywell’s JetWave™ provides in-flight Wi-Fi that is fast, reliable and available anytime, worldwide at any altitude. With JetWave you can connect to Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX, the fastest broadband available for business aviation.
From the moment you climb aboard until you touch down and taxi, only JetWave delivers secure, high-speed business grade Wi-Fi on all your devices simultaneously, as good at the office or home. Stream live TV, follow sports, chat and videoconference and more with superior onboard Wi-Fi– both on the tarmac and at 45,000 feet.
Not only is JetWave’s in-flight Wi-Fi fast and reliable but now installing JetWave is too. As a Connectivity Center of Excellence, Brunswick Aviation Services provides efficient JetWave installation in as little as 10 days, so you don’t have to ground your aircraft for an extended period.
Best of class in cabin connectivity for the way flying was imagined to be experienced. With breathtaking speed and the best of technology, JetWave is altering, and enhancing, the wonder of flight.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Stream-Chat-and-Video-Conference-with-Reliable-In-Flight-Wi-Fi-from-JetWave?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=18_jetwave&utm_content=email1-education]]>
